name: @diazstg/memory-bank-mcp
description: MCP Server for managing Memory Bank — HTTP+Postgres+Redis variant (branch-only, not for npm publish)

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun build src/index.ts --outdir build --target node
scripts.build:start: bun run build && bun run start
scripts.build:ext: cd vscode-extension && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.test: bun test && bun test src/__tests__/server/apiKeyAuth.test.ts src/__tests__/server/cacheCorrectness.test.ts src/__tests__/server/httpTransportServer.test.ts src/__tests__/server/kgContextTools.test.ts src/__tests__/server/originValidation.test.ts src/__tests__/server/rateLimiter.test.ts src/__tests__/server/redisResilience.test.ts src/__tests__/server/sessionIsolation.test.ts src/__tests__/server/thinkingTools.test.ts src/__tests__/server/transportSecurity.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/databaseManagerRls.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/ftsQuery.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/postgresFileSystem.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/rlsIsolation.test.ts
scripts.test:all: bun test && bun test $(find src/__tests__ -path '*/server/*.test.ts' -o -path '*/storage/*.test.ts' | sort | tr '\n' ' ')
scripts.release:docker: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ "$BRANCH" = 'feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase' ] || { echo '❌ ABORT: must be on feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase (current: '"$BRANCH"')'; exit 1; } && VER=$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json && git commit -m "release: ${VER}-http-pg-redis" && git tag "${VER}-http-pg-redis" && git push origin feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase && git push origin "${VER}-http-pg-redis"
scripts.release:dockerhub: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ "$BRANCH" = 'feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase' ] || { echo '❌ ABORT: must be on feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase'; exit 1; } && gh workflow run docker-hub.yml --ref feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase
scripts.release:ghcr: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ "$BRANCH" = 'feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase' ] || { echo '❌ ABORT: must be on feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase'; exit 1; } && gh workflow run docker-ghcr.yml --ref feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase
